item.title: Lead Software Engineer  We are highly profitable and need smarties! (financial district)
item.description:
Company Description
Objective Loyalty is an online marketing company that has been profitable for nearly four years, and operations are growing quickly. Our offices are located in the financial district, and we enjoy spectacular views of the water, bay bridge, and ferry building. Employees have quick access to BART and Muni Metro less than a block away. Our office space is bright and airy, with floor-to-ceiling windows, a kitchen, and plenty of whiteboard space.



We welcome candidates who are dependable and seek an open opportunity to rise to whatever level fits their abilities and drive. Our pay and benefits are extremely competitive, and we arent shy about promoting amazing employees.

Objective Loyalty employees enjoy health insurance, performance bonuses, and a collegial work environment staffed by smart people who are comfortable with their skills and always happy to share their knowledge with new team members. Ideas matter more than egos here, so you can expect to have your best thinking taken seriously by management, right from the start.

We seek only the best, and the right candidate can expect to conquer the world. This is a fun, flexible place to work and our business model thrives in tough economic times. If you are a rockstar and have any uncertainty about the revenue model of your current employer, we are the solution.

Position Description: Lead Software Engineer
You will be the lead engineer for our special projects division. The R&D manager will provide challenging projects, and with your sharp programming skills and independent R&D, you will bring these ideas to life.

Candidate Description
You must be able to code C, pthreads and sockets under a Linux environment in your sleep. You must not be afraid of math and be able to work with in-house mathematicians to implement algorithms. The ideal candidate appreciates working in a fun, flexible environment that rewards ability and empirical results. You are driven to achieve, and you care about the quality of your work product.

Responsibilities
--Lead the development of special projects coded in C, pthreads and TCP/IP sockets
--Perform independent R&D at discretion of engineering manager
--Be able to quickly prototype in perl or python and integrate projects into internal production

Technical Requirements
--Expert knowledge of C programming in a Linux environment
--Expert knowledge of Python, Perl or Ruby
--Expert knowledge of pthreads and TCP/IP sockets
--Basic knowledge of Linux system administration

Personal Requirements
--B.A./B.S. from accredited university or equivalent experience
--Excellent problem-solving skills
--Strong communication skills
--Ability to work alone on tasks
--Dependable and dedicated
--Must LOVE a challenge!!!


This posting may also be viewed at: http://www.objectiveloyalty.com/careers.html
